"Atleast i am a human, i've got no idea what you are, but i know it's not human!" You yell out to her as she walks away. Pleased with yourself, you mount your board and continue to ride down the street.

Jessica stormed into her bedroom filed with hatred... She would do anything to get that prick Ben. Then it hit her.... She ran to her bookshelf and grabbed a book entitled 'The Art of Crystal Ball Gazing'. She's not in high school now, all her effort can be put into gtting revenge on that weasel Ben. After half an hour of reading, Jessica replaced the book and walked over to her cupboard. She removed her beloved crystal ball, and placed it in the middle of the room. After dimming the lights, she approached the ball, and traced her hands around the ball.

121132.content:
Your parents had left you home for the weekend, and as you lay asleep in your bed, your window open to allow for some bit of temperature regulation in the hot summer nights, a pair of eyes stalked you from the darkness.

From out in your backyard Jessica, knowing you would be highly unlikely to leave your house over the weekend, and that with you alone, this opportunity may not arise again, plotted her entrance into the house as she spied into your window with a pair of large binoculars.

Jessica had weighed the risks of getting caught; jail-time, criminal charges, etc, but as she wiggled her sweaty, grungy toes with an audible squish within her punk boots, a wide, toothy smile formed on her face as she decided this was all very worth it. Feeling you degraded beneath her feet was worth almost anything. And if Jessica were completely honest with herself, the only reason she had decided to let you go before was that she felt she may just had climaxed on the spot; that and it gave her something to look forward to in an otherwise painfully boring existence. And she couldn't wait to see your face when you experienced her sweat soaked, but far from exhausted body after she had refused to shower, or remove her boots, or wear socks, for the past week.

After a short second more of planning she began stalking toward your house until she stood right beneath your open window. Throwing a small grappling hook with all the expertise of someone who had been practicing for all of 48 hours, Jessica finally managed to snag your window frame. She sighed with relief, wondering how stupid she would have been if she failed just because she couldn't throw a rope properly.

Climbing to your window, which had proved slightly more difficult than she had expected, Jessica was greeted with the sight of your unconscious form laying on your bed, lit by the pale of the moon over her shoulder. Jessica grinned just as evil as it was wide as she prepared to devour the fruit of her labors.

The goth, seeming almost ethereal in the moon-rays, silently crept over to your bedside, staring into your innocent, unaware face, her brain wandered to think of all the horrors she would enact upon you with her nasty feet. But as she thought of these things, she considered that you were actually kind of cute. And that thought kind of made her hate you even more.

Pulling out a paralyzing agent, she aimed the gas at your face and fired. That should stay working for a few hours, and while you may still be able to talk and move your eyes, it will keep you from resisting her torture. But through this you remained fast asleep; ironically, most likely exhausted from staying up in fear of Jessica doing what she was now.

But Jessica would not have her prey sleeping and unaware as she performed her torment, there was no fear or disgust to satiate her sadism. And so, in response she jumped up on top of you, swinging her long, thick leg over your face to straddle your chest. And as you began to stir, Jessica pulled her large, grimy feet from her leather boots with a grin that would make the cheshire cat blush as she stared at you from behind the stray strands of black hair that hung over her face, making her look like a mad-woman.

And as you awoke, even before you could comprehend what had happened, you were greeted by the unholy stench and nauseating feeling of Jessica's foot-sweat dripping down onto your face as she lifted her dirty, pale foot above your face.

"Wake-y. Wake-y," Jessica greeted in singsong voice.

And that was how the horror started.

1452122.content:
“Out of my way dickhead,” said Bianca as you opened the door for her. As she walked through she kicked you in the shin, causing you to clutch your leg in pain.

“Dammit Bianca,” you howled, “why didn’t you just come in through the back door like you do when you come home from school.”

“Because I saw you come in through the front and I didn’t want to go all the way around back,” she said sitting down on the couch to watch tv. “Oh yeah,” she said remembering something, “I saw that one girl who doesn’t like you, Trisha I think, we talked for a little bit.”

“Oh great,” you groaned, not excited as to what Trisha might have said to your little sister. “What did she want?”

“She said she had a fight with Melinda or someone. She said she can’t stand her anymore and she wants to talk to you about her or something.”

“Oh really?” you asked, your curiosity piqued. This could actually turn out in your favor. Maybe Trisha could give you some useful dirt on Melinda, or better yet, maybe she needed someone’s shoulder to cry on and you could get it on with her. “Bianca, tell mom I’m going over to a friend’s house.”

“No you’re not,” she yelled, “you’re going over to that girl’s place. I’m telling mom that you’re lying to see a girl.”

“No I’m not,” you said. “And why would mom believe you about what you know about my friends.”

“Who knows what I know,” she said very wily. “Maybe twenty bucks could help me remember what I need to know.”

This was how you knew that she was your sister. Only eight and already a con like you. “Fine,” you said digging in your pocket for a twenty dollar bill. “Tell mom I’m at a friend’s house, you don’t remember which, and I’ll call her later.” She took your money, nodded to say she understood and went back to watching cartoons.

Trisha’s parents owned a guest cottage. Since her family didn’t have any relatives who visited much and since there was really no other use for it, Trisha’s parents let her use the guest cottage as her own personal flat. You walked in through the back door of the main property, came up to the door of the cottage, knocked on the door. “Come in Ben,” said Trisha and you walked in through the door. The cottage had four rooms: two bedrooms, and adjoining bathroom, and a living room. Trisha was seated on the couch in the living room when you came in. “Hey Ben,” she said. “I’m glad you came. Me and Melinda had a fight and now I can’t stand that bitch. So now that we’re not friends, I figured that there’s really no reason for us be enemies, so why don’t we try to be friends?” she asked.

“Ok,” you said a little wary still of her, “so what’s the matter with you two. Don’t exactly see eye to eye anymore?”

“Not hardly,” she said, “and soon you and I won’t either?”

“What?” you asked, thinking you heard her say something.

“Nothing,” she said. “I’d like to have a little talk with you, but first, how about a drink? You must be thirsty after the walk over. It’s pretty hot out.”

“Actually yes,” you said feeling rather parched. “It is pretty hot out today and I could use a drink.”

“Alright then,” she said handing you a glass. She gave you a glass of water, or so you thought, and taking a glass herself she toasted saying, “here’s to, hopefully, a wonderful new relationship.” And with that the two of you downed the drinks. All of a sudden you began to feel very funny, a little woozy. That walk took something out of you. And you seemed to want to fall asleep really bad, and soon your eyelids grew heavy and before you knew it you were asleep.

When you woke up you were lying on your back on the hard tile; you must have fallen off your chair when you fell asleep. When you got up however, you noticed something was terribly long. The chair you were sitting in was enormous. It was as tall as a skyscraper. Then you looked at yourself, and to your horror you realized that you were a mere inch tall. You thought of saying something, but there were no words to describe your terror. And then suddenly you heard a voice, which seemed to be as loud as a booming megaphone.

“Well now Ben,” said Trisha, now towering over the miniature you. “I guess you and I don’t see eye to eye anymore either.”

“Trisha,” you said very fearful, “what’s going on? This can’t be happening. This has to be a dream.”

“Oh it’s a dream alright,” she said very pleased with her work, “but it’s my dream come true, and you’re nightmare just beginning.” As she gazed down at you she felt immensely powerful. She could crush you with one swift step, but she wondered if she should call over Melinda. Then again, now could be a great time for her to have some fun with you herself.

Inside her bedroom she opened up her drawer with her free hand and took out a pair of no-show socks. Suddenly, Trisha’s foot came through the ankle of the sock and Ben was forced to the front of the sock, but there was no escaping; the sock fit around her foot tight without anything in it, but now it was a very tight fit. Then it struck you. "Well duh," you said slapping your forehead. "How could I forget, Lance!" Lance was your best friend. The two of you had known each other since elementary school. He worked in the Electronic Hut at the mall, and he was especially good with computers. Sometimes that got him into trouble, like the time he tried to hack the school computers to change your grades for you ( he got caught but they never noticed his handiwork). Lance was good, he was trustworthy, and best of all he was close. He had always lived a block down since as long as you could remember. There wasn't a moment to lose, quickly you pulled out your cellphone and dialed his number.

"Hey can I call you right back," he answered right away. "I'm playing WoW and my priest is just about to level."

"No, you have to help me," you said, "it's a matter of of life and death. Meet me at Julia's house and hurry!"

Lance was over in a matter of minutes. You were already waiting for him outside on the doorstep, keeping a lookout for Julia. "Alright," he said, "what's so important it couldn't wait."

“It’s her computer,” you said leading him into her house to her computer. “I accidentally locked her out and if she comes home and sees it she’ll kill me.”

“Damn,” you said, “isn’t there anyway you can use her old password?”

“It wouldn’t let me anyway, when you unlock it like this you have to change the password. And even if it did I don’t think I’d have enough time to pull it up through all this memory.”

They were absolutely putrid, but you washed like crazy until they were all passable. It wasn’t the best job, but you could always claim incompetence. You lay there on the warm asphalt, but even in the summer heat Julia’s urine is starting to cool on you. You feel paralyzed, but even if you could move what could you do? There’s a crowd of fifty adults here laughing at you and uploading the most humiliating thing imaginable for the entire world to see right now! Just then Julia’s voice cuts through the din.

“Who’s next? Let’s make sure this piece of shit never raises a hand to a woman again!”

You scramble to your knees and beg for all your worth.

“Please Julia don’t! You’ve already won! You kicked my ass and pissed all over me, you win! Please don’t do this!”

She doesn’t say a word, just smirks at you and then front kicks you in the chest. Knocking you backwards on the ground. What follows is a waterfall of piss, spit, and insults. Some people don’t join in, but at least thirty of those in attendance add to the soup of liquid waste you’re lying in. Women your age and slightly older, women in their 40s and 50s, and even the guys you were playing basketball with eagerly drench you in urine while it goes viral on the internet. You don’t protest or beg, that’s useless at this point. You simply squeeze your eyes and mouth shut as tight as you can while the deluge continues.

Eventually the crowd disperses and leaves you lying in a veritable lake of pee. You don’t know it yet but you’ve already become a hashtag (#pissboy). Julia is the last person left on the court. She’s sitting on a nearby bench scrolling through her phone and smiling quite contentedly to herself. And why shouldn’t she? She has turned you, a boy who had made her life hell...into a complete laughing stock. Slowly you drag yourself up to your hands and knees, your clothes as heavy with liquid as if you’d just climbed out of a pool. Only this doesn’t smell half as pleasant as chlorine.

“Done feeling sorry for yourself piss boy?” Julia asks while looking at you. “Good God you look awful.”

You’re still too heartbroken to respond, you just remain there on your hands and knees while the piss of three dozen people drips off of you.

What happens next?
1552133.title: The crowd gets involved!

choices: You show up at her house in the morning.  Slave bitch time.
You don't show up... she gonna get you.
Something Else Happens.
15521332.content:
"Now you stupid piss bitch, tomorrow I want you at my house and ready to serve me as a good little slave. If not I'll make sure you every day is like this. I know your weakness, I know where you live I know everything. Be there or regret it, there won't be a second chance."

You sobbed, utterly drenched in piss. You saw Julia, the cruel girl who had ruined your life walk away. What were you going to do? You knew if you went to her house it was going to be awful. But could you stand to look over your shoulder the rest of your life? Could you stand knowing she would put you through this hell again, that she would do so eagerly and repeatedly? You shuddered. Horrible choices. What would you do?
15521332.title: She leaves you there.

choices: She accepts your apology
She kicks your ass
Something else happens
1553.content:
You stand rooted to the spot. Paralyzed by fear. You’re afraid if you fight her you’ll lose, you’ve never been in a fight and Julia’s confidence really shakes you. You’re more scared that if you run she’ll catch you and it’ll be even worse. You have to try to reason with her.

“Please Julia. I know I’ve been a dick, but I’m really sorry about that.” You reach up to wipe her loogie off your face as you plead with her. She responds with an outburst of laughter.

“Oh. My. God. You are so pathetic!”

“Look, I promise I’ll make it up to yo-“

You stop mid-sentence as another loogie smacks into your face. Directly between your eyes. You reach up calmly to wipe it away and then Julia speaks.

“No. Leave it there.”

You drop your hand to to your sides and feel the warm spit dripping down your face. Your cheeks burn with humiliation but you know you have to play by her rules to avoid making her angry. You begin to open your mouth to make your case, but she cuts you off immediately.

“Shut up, if you want to talk to me then do it from your knees.”

You take a quick look around and don’t see anybody so you drop to your knees in the grass in front of her. She claps her hands with delight and lets loose a howl of laughter.

“I always told you I’d have you on your knees begging me for forgiveness some day. Looks like I was right!” She stops to stare at you, a wry smile stretching across her face. “Well...beg me not to kick your ass. If you do a good enough job, I might not!”

So you beg, on your knees, with spit and phlegm dripping off your face.

“Please Julia! I know I was terrible to you in the past, I know I’ve been an asshole, and you didn’t deserve that. But violence isn’t the answer and beating me up won’t fix anything. I promise I’ll be nicer to you from now on! I’ll do whatever you want!”

Tears are welling in your eyes as Julia howls with laughter above you. A minute goes by before she composes herself and looks at you.

What happens next?
1553.title: Beg her to leave you alone

info.brief_description: Your enemy discovers your biggest weakness!
info.description:
3000+ views... thank you everyone!!!

I NEED MORE AUTHORS... Please feel free to add to my story and keep it growing. Message me if you need to ask me anything, and i will reply as soon as i can!

Your name is Ben, you're 18 years old, 6 foot 2, smart, and the world is your oyster! You've just finished high school and your ready to enter into the real world. But what you don't know is that your worst enemy has become aware of your biggest weakness, and she plans on using it against you!

You start by choosing your enemy, which can be one of the following girls:

Sarah - 19 years old, she is about 5 foot 10 and an incredibly hot blonde haired girl. Wears skirts to show off her legs, has pink painted nails and loves flip flops. She was head cheerleader and an excellent dancer at Ben's school. Because of this, she has excellent balance, but trains alot to become a better dancer. Not too bright, which Ben frequently teased her about in school. Because of Ben's insults at her intelligence, she hates Ben and would do whatever it takes to shut him up for once and for all.

Jessica - 18 years old, she is a goth girl that is almost 6 feet tall. Always dresses in black with black nails and black hair. She is never afraid to voice out her unusual beliefs, often dark, mystical and evil. Ben always teased her when she was younger, and all the way through high school, which has led to her dispising Ben completely. She has always cursed Ben's existence, and once day hopes to have Ben on his knees begging for mercy.

Melinda - 18 years old, she is a cute smart brunette girl who is about 5 foot 6. She is very hippy-like, often wearing multi-colored clothes with multi-colored nail polish. She always goes barefoot, and as a result her feet are constantly dirty. During high school she had a crush on Ben and actually dated Ben for a year before Ben cheated on her and broke her heart. Since then she has sworn revenge on Ben, and she will get it one way or another.

Trisha - 18 years old, she is a cute red head with a firey attitude, about 5 foot 3. She is best friends with Melinda and dresses very similar, with multi-colored clothes and nails. She also loves going bare foot. From the first day Ben and Melinda started dating, she disagreed with the relationship, and tried to talk melinda out of it. Ben would tease her frequently about her small height and her smelly feet. When Ben broke Melinda's heart, she swore she would get ben back, and show him how it felt to be small.

Julia - 21 years old, light brown haired, not ugly, but not necissarily attractive, about 5 foot 7. Julia is a smart but overly confident girl who wears skirts and flip flops all the time. She is Ben's neighbour, and has been for the last 10 years. About 5 years ago, Ben humiliated her infront of her friends and made her cry, and since then, Ben has constantly teased her about it. Julia vowed to herself that one day, she will get Ben on his knees, right where she wants him.

And then just go from there.

Feel free to add to this story, but please make the chapters DESCRIPTIVE and moderately long!!! Can include pretty much anything, but make sure Ben is constantly hated by his enemy or enemies!

I will remove any content that i feel is unsatisfactory (such as one line chapters) or inappropriate. But other than that, go wild!!!

I will give GP's for good additions and reviews!
